abstract.text: Bring RealityKit content into your app with views and renderers.

inlineContent.text: Views are the building blocks for apps that include RealityKit content.
Each view displays RealityKit content in your app either by rendering the content
in a window, volume, or an immersive space.

abstract.text: A mode that determines whether a rendering effect is enabled or disabled.
A view that asynchronously loads and displays a 3D model.
Simulate and render 3D content for use in your augmented reality apps.
A renderer that displays a RealityKit scene in an existing Metal workflow.
